channel.title: Editor on Crazcalm
channel.description: Recent content in Editor on Crazcalm

item.title: Micro: My New Editor?
item.description: Why Learn Micro? I have no good reason as to why someone should learn micro over some other text editor. With that being said, here are some reasons as to why I want to learn how to use this editor. It is written in Go. I am trying to learn Go, so a text editor written in Go appeals to me. Writing Go code in it is easy!
